org.mundo.service
Interface IUS

All Known Implementing Classes:
DoIUS
public interface IUS

Basic interface for the Mundo entity US (User aSsociable). Each ME creates its own zone for services, referred to as the MINE (My Individual Network Environment) zone. When an US gets associated, it registers its services with the MINE zone. This way, these services become accessible for the ME and all other services in the MINE.

See Also:
IME

Method Summary
 void associate(DoIME me)
          Associates this US with the specified ME.
 void deassociate(DoIME me)
          Deassociates this US from the specified ME.
 java.lang.String getName()
          Returns the friendly name of the US.
